Reading.Muhlenberg High School: Muhlenberg High School is a midsized, public high school in Laureldale, Berks County, Pennsylvania. In 2013, Muhlenberg High School's enrollment was 868 pupils (10-12th), with 41% eligible for a federal free or reduced-price lunch due to the family poverty. Additionally, 16% of pupils received special education services, while 3.5% were identified as gifted.
